TopicTitle: Which Parts/Mods are missing to load my old Craft?

Articles.Content: Since i moved from 23.0 to 23.5 i wanted to reuse my old Ships i created with tons of mods. I think i reinstalled all mods (and unlocked all the parts in the R&D) but i still cant load all crafts. Is there a way to see which parts are missing?

HI , aside from going through the persistence and any craft files manually checking which parts are missing and or not compatible I dont know of another way, there used to be a craft fixng web page but I dont't know if it's still active or even functioned well enough to do what you require, I've always resorted to rebuilding as it ends up a faster option and avoids compatibility issues

My solution was to use ModAdmin by MacTee. It will analyze your craft files and tell you which parts are missing. then you simply install those missing parts, and your craft is back in action.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/26031-Win-KSP-Mod-Admin-v1-3-11-Mod-install-with-a-few-clicks
